channel.title: Portfolio website for Hakon Petermann Rueda
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Hakon Petermann Rueda

item.title: About me
item.description: My story, still being written1234 You’ve probably already noticed that I’ve structured this website in three main parts: The past - Engineering The present - Business The future - People This, I’ve realised, is the best way to tell my story. You will notice the words next to the phases of my life (“Engineering”, “Business”, and “People”) too, these are the single-word characterizations of my career in its respective phases.

item.title: Past Summary
item.description: My story, still being written The one-word characterization of this phase of my life is “engineering”. To be more specific I completed my Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering. Just as you didn’t go straight form birth into university - I didn’t either. I was born in, and grew up in what I still to this day believe is the most beuatiful place in the world: Cape Town, South Africa.

item.title: Who drinks the most
item.description: Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits? library(fivethirtyeight) data(drinks) What are the variable types? Any missing values we should worry about? Variable types are chr (character), int (integer), and dbl (double). glimpse(drinks) ## Rows: 193 ## Columns: 5 ## $ country <chr> "Afghanistan", "Albania", "Algeria", "... ## $ beer_servings <int> 0, 89, 25, 245, 217, 102, 193, 21, 261... ## $ spirit_servings <int> 0, 132, 0, 138, 57, 128, 25, 179, 72, .

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
